author: Luminary Lane
name: Lane
description: AI-powered brand automation platform that extracts brand DNA, discovers optimal marketing channels, generates on-brand content, and orchestrates multi-channel campaigns. Lane helps startups and SMBs automate their marketing with AI agents.

skills.name: Brand Analysis
skills.description: Extract and codify brand DNA including voice, tone, personas, visual guidelines, and messaging frameworks from existing brand assets.

skills.name: Channel Discovery
skills.description: Identify optimal marketing channels using the 19-channel traction framework based on brand, audience, budget, and growth stage.

skills.name: Content Generation
skills.description: Generate on-brand content across social media, email, blog, and other marketing channels using brand DNA for consistency.

skills.name: Campaign Orchestration
skills.description: Plan and coordinate multi-channel marketing campaigns with unified messaging, scheduling, and performance tracking.

skills.name: A2A Readiness Assessment
skills.description: Assess and improve brand readiness for AI agent discovery and the agentic web including structured data, agent cards, and LLMs.txt.
